name: Confédération Européenne des Associations de Petites et Moyennes Entreprises
goal:
- Politische und wirtschaftliche Interessenvertretung von europäischen KMU Verbänden.
- Information, Eventorganisation und Pressearbeit zu KMU-relevanten Themen
- Mittelstandsforschung und EU-Projekte für KMUs
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- SBA
- Better Regulation
- Digital Agenda
- EFSI
- TTIP
- Energieunion/nachhaltige Energiequellen/Energieeffizienz
- Jugendarbeitslosigkeit
- Fachkräftemangel
- Access to finance for SMEs
- European Banking Union
- European Monetary Union
- European Defense and Security Union
- Migration and Integration
